summary: I am a technical professional who has worked as a developer, a business professional and a system architect. I know I'd be a valuable addition to your organization as I've been a manager, a technical leader and at all times a programmer.
interests: See my github for my public repos of what I'm working on. I'm currently building/migrating a stock/crypto tracking app to Angular 4 and Typescript.  I've recently completed an home aeroponics lab managed by a nodejs server. I'm also persuing Java certification.
